quality.name: Purity Bonus (Adept)
quality.notes: If ever your Magic rating changes, you must remove and re-add this quality to ensure your power points are properly calculated.

quality.name: Bodyguard
quality.notes: Characters with this quality apply a +2 dice pool modifier to Perception tests and Electronic Warfare tests involving the use of a sensor. In addition, the character may Ready Weapon or Take Aim as a Free Action.

quality.name: Merc
quality.notes: Characters with this quality suffer only a –1 penalty on Ranged Combat for Attacker Running and increase by 1 any bonus they received on Ranged Defense tests for cover (eg. Partial Cover provides a +3, Good Cover provides a +5).

quality.name: Panzer (Fear/Wound)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality receive a +2 dice pool modifier to resist fear and intimidation, including magically induced fear from spells or critter powers or they may substitute their Body attribute for Charisma when calculating their Intimidation dice pool (choose one). In addition, they may ignore two boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers (which cannot be combined with other forms of wound modifier reduction, such as High Pain Tolerance) or they receive a +1 dice pool modifier to Body when making Damage Resistance tests (choose one).

quality.name: Panzer (Fear/Soak)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality receive a +2 dice pool modifier to resist fear and intimidation, including magically induced fear from spells or critter powers or they may substitute their Body attribute for Charisma when calculating their Intimidation dice pool (choose one). In addition, they may ignore two boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers (which cannot be combined with other forms of wound modifier reduction, such as High Pain Tolerance) or they receive a +1 dice pool modifier to Body when making Damage Resistance tests (choose one).

quality.name: Panzer (Intimdate/Wound)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality receive a +2 dice pool modifier to resist fear and intimidation, including magically induced fear from spells or critter powers or they may substitute their Body attribute for Charisma when calculating their Intimidation dice pool (choose one). In addition, they may ignore two boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers (which cannot be combined with other forms of wound modifier reduction, such as High Pain Tolerance) or they receive a +1 dice pool modifier to Body when making Damage Resistance tests (choose one).

quality.name: Panzer (Intimdate/Soak)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality receive a +2 dice pool modifier to resist fear and intimidation, including magically induced fear from spells or critter powers or they may substitute their Body attribute for Charisma when calculating their Intimidation dice pool (choose one). In addition, they may ignore two boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers (which cannot be combined with other forms of wound modifier reduction, such as High Pain Tolerance) or they receive a +1 dice pool modifier to Body when making Damage Resistance tests (choose one).

quality.name: Razorboy (Damage)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality may add +2 dice to Intimidation tests or +1 DV with implanted melee weapons or unarmed strikes with cyberlimbs (choose one). In addition, the character may add +1 to any Street Knowledge skill tests.

quality.name: Razorboy (Intimidation)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality may add +2 dice to Intimidation tests or +1 DV with implanted melee weapons or unarmed strikes with cyberlimbs (choose one). In addition, the character may add +1 to any Street Knowledge skill tests.

quality.name: Ronin (Bioware/DV)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality reduce the Essence Cost of bioware or cyberware implants (choose one) by 10%, rounded down to the tenth. This rebate is cumulative with the reduction offered by the chosen ’ware’s grade, if any (e.g., the reduction for alphaware of 0.8 is reduced by ten percent, or 0.08, to become 0.72, and is rounded down to 0.7). This bonus is applied to already installed augmentations, but will create an appropriately sized essence hole. This discount does not stack with the Biocompatability quality. In addition, they may choose one of the following: +1 DV with melee attacks, including unarmed; or, when they have a melee weapon readied (with which their skill to use in melee is at least 4 ranks) and are not surprised, +2 to defense tests against melee and ranged attacks. If a Ronin’s Notoriety ever overtakes his Street Cred, he maintains his Essence discount but loses the DV or Defense bonus.

quality.name: Ronin (Cyberware/DV)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality reduce the Essence Cost of bioware or cyberware implants (choose one) by 10%, rounded down to the tenth. This rebate is cumulative with the reduction offered by the chosen ’ware’s grade, if any (e.g., the reduction for alphaware of 0.8 is reduced by ten percent, or 0.08, to become 0.72, and is rounded down to 0.7). This bonus is applied to already installed augmentations, but will create an appropriately sized essence hole. This discount does not stack with the Biocompatability quality. In addition, they may choose one of the following: +1 DV with melee attacks, including unarmed; or, when they have a melee weapon readied (with which their skill to use in melee is at least 4 ranks) and are not surprised, +2 to defense tests against melee and ranged attacks. If a Ronin’s Notoriety ever overtakes his Street Cred, he maintains his Essence discount but loses the DV or Defense bonus.

quality.name: Ronin (Bioware/Defense)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality reduce the Essence Cost of bioware or cyberware implants (choose one) by 10%, rounded down to the tenth. This rebate is cumulative with the reduction offered by the chosen ’ware’s grade, if any (e.g., the reduction for alphaware of 0.8 is reduced by ten percent, or 0.08, to become 0.72, and is rounded down to 0.7). This bonus is applied to already installed augmentations, but will create an appropriately sized essence hole. This discount does not stack with the Biocompatability quality. In addition, they may choose one of the following: +1 DV with melee attacks, including unarmed; or, when they have a melee weapon readied (with which their skill to use in melee is at least 4 ranks) and are not surprised, +2 to defense tests against melee and ranged attacks. If a Ronin’s Notoriety ever overtakes his Street Cred, he maintains his Essence discount but loses the DV or Defense bonus.

quality.name: Ronin (Cyberware/Defense)
quality.notes: Characters with this quality reduce the Essence Cost of bioware or cyberware implants (choose one) by 10%, rounded down to the tenth. This rebate is cumulative with the reduction offered by the chosen ’ware’s grade, if any (e.g., the reduction for alphaware of 0.8 is reduced by ten percent, or 0.08, to become 0.72, and is rounded down to 0.7). This bonus is applied to already installed augmentations, but will create an appropriately sized essence hole. This discount does not stack with the Biocompatability quality. In addition, they may choose one of the following: +1 DV with melee attacks, including unarmed; or, when they have a melee weapon readied (with which their skill to use in melee is at least 4 ranks) and are not surprised, +2 to defense tests against melee and ranged attacks. If a Ronin’s Notoriety ever overtakes his Street Cred, he maintains his Essence discount but loses the DV or Defense bonus.

quality.name: Marksman
quality.notes: Characters with this quality are not required to halve their Willpower when calculating how many Take Aim actions they may perform with a ranged weapon. This quality also grants a +1 bonus to the Sneak skill.

quality.name: Street Ninja
quality.notes: When attacking an opponent with a melee or throwing weapons attack, characters with this quality may divide any Called Shot penalties in half. This is applied before all other effects that reduce called shot penalties and does not stack with the bonus from the Strive for Perfection quality. In addition, they gain +1 die on Surprise Tests and +1 die on Sneak Tests.

oneof.quality: Jack of All Trades Master of None

quality.name: Like The Back Of My Hand
Obscure Aura
quality.note: As a non-Awakened, your aura is more obscure than most. All attempts to assense you receive a dice pool penalty equal to your Willpower.

quality.name: Critter Magnet
quality.notes: Non Hostile Critters in 10 meters follow you for 10 5d6 minutes, giving up to -3 to physical and appropriate social tests

quality.name: It Just Has To Fit
quality.notes: Allow the ability to build in one powertrain mod at half the capactiy cost but 50% extra nuyen (extended threshold with availabilitX2

quality.name: Improved Tactical Network
quality.notes: Provides Pi-Tac II benefits (except for Trauma Module + Host Enhancement). Combat Mode bonus is only to one combat active skill at a time.

quality.name: Transcendent Tactical Network
quality.notes: Provides Pi-Tac III benefits (except for Trauma Module + Host Enhancement). Combat Mode bonus is only to one combat active skill at a time.

quality.name: Cyberlimb Armor Reduction
quality.notes: Each replacement limb after the first reduces the Armor or damage resistance provided by other augmentations by 1. Damage resistance is reduced before armor.

quality.name: Cyberlimb Damage Resistance Reduction
quality.notes: Each replacement limb after the first reduces the Armor or damage resistance provided by other augmentations by 1. Armor is reduced before damage resistance.

quality.name: Pentathlete
quality.notes: Permits the use of Supernatural Prowess with one additional skill per purchase.

quality.name: Trajectory Mastery
quality.notes: When using a ranged weapon equipped with a Smartgun system or a laser sight, you gain an additional DV for every six ranks that you have in the associated weapon skill, provided the mod applies. Additionally, you always gain +3 accuracy with the weapon. Does not apply with throwing weapons.

quality.name: Deft Thrower
quality.notes: When attacking with a non-explosive throwing weapon, you gain an additional DV for every 6 ranks that you have in the associated weapon skill. This bonus applies for both the Throwing Weapons skill and any Exotic Throwing Weapons skill. When taking the Multiple Attack action with a qualifying throwing weapon, gain +4 to the total dice pool.

quality.name: Augmented Strength Mastery
quality.notes: When using a melee weapon, you gain an additional DV for every six ranks you have in the associated weapon skill. Additionally, you gain +4 accuracy with all melee weapons. You gain an additional Free Action once per combat, on the character’s first pass.

quality.name: Corner Shooter
quality.notes: When using a ranged weapon equipped with a Smartgun system, you reduce the penalty from “Attacker Firing From Cover With Imaging Device” to 0.

quality.name: Master Brawler
quality.notes: Whenever you make a location-specific called-shot with a melee or unarmed weapon, you reduce the called shot penalty by 3.

quality.name: Hard Skin
quality.notes:
The effect of this quality varies based on the type of ware installed.
If orthoskin is installed, for every 2 points of ware rating, gain +1 armor.
If dermal plating is installed, for every 2 points of ware rating, gain +1 armor. For every 3 points of ware rating, gain an auto-success in any soak tests where armor is included.
If smartskin is installed, gain 2 DV with your smartskin melee attacks, and for every 2 points of rating, gain +1 armor.
If a dermal sheath is installed, the character gains +1 armor at R1 and +2 armor for R2 or R3 dermal sheathing.
If a cybertorso is installed, either obvious or synthetic, gain +2 armor and +1 limit to all combat actions.

quality.name: Shock Abrogation Training
quality.notes: If the character takes 4 or more damage and that damage would be reduced by any of the prerequisite ware the character has installed, the damage is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 2) instead of 1.

quality.name: No Pain, No Gain
quality.notes: You have adapted your nervous system to the sensation of pain and use it as a performance booster. For every 2 boxes of damage compensated for by your Damage Compensator or Adrenaline Pump, gain +1 dice to offensive actions. (Includes ranged/melee attacks, attack actions on the matrix etc)

quality.name: Skillsoft Adaptation
quality.notes: Once per 24 hour period, you may apply edge to a skill test involving an Activesoft, Knowsoft, Linguasoft, Knowledge Hardwire, or Active Hardwire.

quality.name: Redundant Protection
quality.notes: The protection given to your senses have moved beyond just a shield, and become a natural state of being. The weaknesses of biology have no hold on you anymore. You are immune to Called Shot: Shake Up. If you have Eye Protectors, you are immune to Called Shot: Eye. If you have Ear Protectors or Dampers, you are immune to Called Shot: Ear.

quality.name: Instinctive Optimization
quality.notes: Immediately before initiative is rolled, you may make either a Tag action or a Calibrate action. The effects of this action are applied before initiative is ordered for the first pass.
